name: Initial D: Mountain Vengeance
description: Drive to survive as you drift through the dangerous mountain curves in the world of Initial D. In Initial D: Mountain Vengeance, you'll battle for glory, passion, pain, and revenge against tough street-racing teams. You can race as the Akina Speed Stars, Night Kids, Red Suns, or Impact Blue, or you can challenge them all as Tak. As you race on each track on the mountain pass, you can unlock bonus tracks and music from the Initial D anime series.
